LocaleResource.Value: 若要防止全文索引變得臃腫，Microsoft SQL Server 具有一種機制，將丟棄常常出現不幫助搜尋的詞。這些詞稱為干擾詞，或停止詞。在區域設定特定的干擾詞文件中列出了干擾詞。例如，在英語語言環境，單詞如"a"、"and" "is" 和 "the"的英語干擾詞文件中，和被拋棄的全文索引，因為他們經驗主義地稱為是無用的搜尋。請聯繫您的 SQL 服務器管理員聯繫，以獲取有關它的詳細資訊。

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.GoogleAnalytics.help
LocaleResource.Value: Please configure the settings: Configuration -> Settings -> General settings -> Tab Google Analytics

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.GoogleAnalytics.help2
LocaleResource.Value: An error occurred, please check logs

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.GoogleAnalytics_help1
LocaleResource.Value: 1. Register a Google Analytics account. Keep in mind that you need to wait 24h before GA can obtain some data to display.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.GoogleAnalytics_help2
LocaleResource.Value: 2. Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials > select credentials for your project > New Credentials > Service account key > download a .json file from your account, and open it with text editor.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.GoogleAnalytics_help3
LocaleResource.Value: 3. Copy the value of "private_key" e.g. -----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\n ... -----END PRIVATE KEY-----\n

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.GoogleAnalytics_help5
LocaleResource.Value: 5. Get your view ID, https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/ > Admin > View Settings > View ID. e.g. 412390048

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.GoogleAnalytics_help6
LocaleResource.Value: 6. If you changed your certificate password, then you will need it too - but by default the value of certificate password is "notasecret".

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.HoneypotEnabled.Hint
